name: My Cozy Place
description:
My cozy place, is a browser game that invites you to chill with a mix between pop-it and color-by-number mechanic. You can relax as long as you want with our randomly generated boards in this cozy atmosphere with rain, Lo-fi music and motivational phrases.

Submission for the Mental Health Game Jam

----Team----

Laura del Pino Díaz - Programming

Jonatan Jiménez Karar - Artist

----Additional Assets----

Kenney Assets

Lo-Fi Music Pack
